newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austrian shares close down, seen taking a break.
newsitem.headline: Austrian shares close down, seen taking a break.

text.p: 1215 GMT - Austrian shares inched lower on Tuesday, extending this week's losses after ATX failed to break psychologically important resistance at 1,100 points on Monday.
Traders say index likely to move sideways over next few days, taking a breather before resuming upward trend.
"People realise the 1,100 mark is going to be a difficult one to crack," said one.
* ATX index down 6.11 points or 0.6 percent at 1,088.60
* November ATX future down 3.7 points at 1,092.5
* 14 ATX shares down, five up, two unchanged
* Top decliner Austria Mikro Systeme, or AMS, down 5.3 percent or 46 schillings at 818.0 ahead of nine-month results due next week
* Vienna Bourse index down 1.76 points or 0.4 percent at 417.59
